bibl.title: Telegram from Wickliffe Rose to Henry Rose Carter, December 6, 1921

div1.head: Telegram from Wickliffe Rose to Henry Rose Carter, December 6, 1921
div1.opener:
Telegrams: OXYMORON WESTRAND, LONDON.
Telephone: GERRARD 4314-4315.
The Lancet Building,
1 & 2, Bedford Street,
London, W.C.2
Asst. Sug. Gen. HR Carter,
2121 California, N. W.
Washington, DC
Dec 6" 1921
Exhibit A.
Dr. to Joint Committee of
HENRY FROWDE and HODDER & STOUGHTON.
REF. No. 3183
OXFORD UNIVERSITY PRESS
SIR ERNEST HO WILLIAMS
W. HEISER HODDER WILLIAMS
CECIL STOUGHTON
